name: Seize the Servos
description:
You are a tiny robot with very little power. Your goal? Gain more.

If you run out of power, you won't be able to move. Can you complete these puzzling levels without... losing control?

HOW TO PLAY

  • Move using the arrow keys or WASD.
  • Use the mouse to aim and left/right click to use equipment (not all equipment uses both).
  • On the left are your battery levels.
  • Moving and using equipment drains battery for that action.
  • You cannot perform any action if its battery is completely drained.
  • Picking up a battery will refill its matching action.
  • Press 'R' to restart a level. If you get super stuck, the PAGE UP key will skip to the next level.
  • Vacuum:
    • Left Click - Sucks in pickups and flying enemies
    • Right Click - Blows pickups and flying enemies away. Blowing also moves you on ice tiles.
  • Shotgun:
    • Left Click - Shoots a bullet that destroys enemies and certain walls. Will move you backwards on ice tiles.

CREDITS
